description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Toybox Racing puts you in the driver's seat... of a toy car. Race around rooms filled with toys in a child's racetrack. Dodge books, baseball bats, building blocks and your parents' computer chair. The game features realistic physics and support for 1 to 4 players.
